item.description:
Dinner for Schmucks opens on July 30. Let's schedule a Saturday movie meetup for this new comedy starring Steve Carell and Paul Rudd. Tim (Paul Rudd) tries to win his boss' dinner game by bringing the biggest idiot he can find to dinner. That idiot is Barry (Steve Carell) also starring Zach Galifinakis as another idiot. This movie is based on the French film "Le Diner de Cons" (The Dinner Game).

This movie is playing at 6:50 PM at Showcase in Worcester. Let's plan to meet in the lobby at about 6:20. If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

Afterwards, go to dinner with another schmuck.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner for Schmucks
